title: Strengthening System Design Practical Competencies: Challenge-Based Learning for Developing Digital Badges in the Chemical Field

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate scientific problem-solving abilities through chemical experiment data analysis and interpretation
Learners can research chemistry-related topics using academic databases and credible information sources

Over three weeks, learners complete three digital badge challenge tasks (e.g., GitHub repository creation, CI/CD pipeline setup, open-source contribution) at ≥80% completion, write five-page reports, and achieve ≥4/5 in peer reviews

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
